Fog.description: Fog reduces visibility and makes navigation difficult.
effects: Visibility limited to 40ft
-5 to navigation
Forage DC increases by 5

Extreme Heat.description: Intense heat requires additional water and constitution checks.
effects: DC 15 Con save for medium/heavy armor or gain +1 exhaustion
Three gallons of water required per day instead of two
Water consumed at a rate of 2 gallons per day

Heavy Wind.description: Strong winds create challenges for travel and combat.
effects: DC 10 Con save to avoid +1 exhaustion if traveling
Missile weapon attacks are at disadvantage and range is halved
All checks relying on balance are at disadvantage

Heavy Rain & Fog.description: Heavy rain combined with fog severely impacts navigation and visibility.
effects: -5 to navigation (roll at disadvantage)
Visibility limited to 40ft
Missile weapon attacks at disadvantage with half range
All checks relying on grip (climbing, running, jumping, etc.) are at disadvantage
Foraging DC increases by 13

Heavy Rain.description: Heavy rain makes navigation and physical activity more difficult.
effects: Navigation checks rolled at disadvantage
Visibility limited to 150ft
Missile weapon attacks at disadvantage with half range
All checks relying on grip (climbing, running, jumping, etc.) are at disadvantage
Foraging DC increases by 8

Tropical Storm.description: Severe storms bring flooding and make travel almost impossible.
effects: +1 exhaustion if traveling, +1 exhaustion on failed DC Con save
Navigation checks rolled at disadvantage
All rivers flooded, canoes swamped
Visibility limited to 100ft
Missile weapons are impossible to use
Foraging and rain catchers are unusable
